message: 1. ai matro amader moulvibazar jugidor theke amar ak boro bhai ke tar dukan ar cash theke ber kore bedhom mar dhor koreche abong take dhore ni'a geche. Police onnay bhabe ai niroporad manush ta ke dhore ni'a gelo. Sorkar r Police ar ottacar sojjo korbo r kotodin amader sojjo korte hobe? Apnarai bolun? Plz sobaike share korun.
